title: Minister for Narcotics Control condoles demise of Arif Nizami
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 21 (APP): Federal Minister for Narcotics Control, Brig (r) Ijaz Ahmad Shah Wednesday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of renowned journalist Arif Nizami.
He prayed to Almighty to bless the departed soul with eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss with fortitude.
He said, the services of Arif Nizami in the field of journalism would always be remembered, adding, Nizami was a very close friend and colleague.
Arif Nizamiâ€™s absence would always be felt in the world of journalism, the minister added.
